title: Participatory Dialogic Learning Course for Early Childhood Education Leadership Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational early childhood education theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Involves pre-service and in-service teachers from diverse early childhood education settings, fostering a collaborative learning environment for leadership development.

learning_goals: Learners can independently design and execute projects to solve leadership challenges encountered in early childhood education settings
Through dialogue with peers, learners can recognize and develop their leadership identity
Learners can develop and apply leadership practice strategies tailored to the context of early childhood education settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
